verbs.description: SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - [ARG0: North Korea] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: that it 's still willing to sit for talks with the United States " at any time , ( in ) any format , " a remarkably restrained and diplomatic response , from a nation noted for its proud belligerence , to U.S. President Donald Trump 's abrupt cancellation of a summit with the North 's autocratic leader , Kim Jong Un] .

SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - North Korea said Friday that [ARG1: it] [V: 's] [ARGM-TMP: still] [ARG2: willing to sit for talks with the United States " at any time , ( in ) any format] , " [ARGM-ADV: a remarkably restrained and diplomatic response , from a nation noted for its proud belligerence , to U.S. President Donald Trump 's abrupt cancellation of a summit with the North 's autocratic leader , Kim Jong Un] .

SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - North Korea said Friday that [ARG1: it] 's still willing to [V: sit] [ARGM-PRP: for talks with the United States] " [ARGM-TMP: at any time , ( in ) any format] , " a remarkably restrained and diplomatic response , from a nation noted for its proud belligerence , to U.S. President Donald Trump 's abrupt cancellation of a summit with the North 's autocratic leader , Kim Jong Un .

SEOUL , South Korea ( AP ) - North Korea said Friday that it 's still willing to sit for talks with the United States " at any time , ( in ) any format , " a remarkably restrained and diplomatic response , from [ARG1: a nation] [V: noted] [ARG2: for its proud belligerence] , to U.S. President Donald Trump 's abrupt cancellation of a summit with the North 's autocratic leader , Kim Jong Un .
